{{Envisaged Echo Intro}}

==Phase I==
===Challenge Objectives===
* Light up all the Electro Monuments within a short time

==Phase II==
===Challenge Objectives===
* Defeat all opponents within the time limit

===Special Rules===
* During the "Driving Thunder Phase II" challenge, every 3 targets destroyed will grant the following buff for 30s: Character gains an Electro DMG Bonus and increased Elemental Mastery.
* During the "Driving Thunder Phase II" challenge, Fruits of the Vine will periodically appear and pursue characters, {{Color|bp|applying Dendro}} to opponents they touch. Fruits of the Vine will explode after touching a character, applying Dendro to characters and opponents within their AoE once more.
